about_the_game:
Getting the right gear is highly important when jumping into battle and the [Foreign Series] Equipment Set is no exception. With the [Foreign Series] Equipment Set equipped, you can defeat everyone in this 2D world in no time!

The [Foreign Series] Equipment Set includes:
Weapons
• Foreign Sword: Neptune
• Foreign Blade: Noire
• Foreign Axe: Blanc
• Foreign Spear: Vert
• Foreign Cards: Chrome

Bracelets
• Foreign Gloves: All characters
• Foreign Bracelet: Neptune, Vert, Artisan, IF
• Foreign Gauntlet: Neptune, Vert, Artisan, IF
• Foreign Armlet: Noire, Blanc, Chrome, Compa
• Foreign Wristband: Noire, Blanc, Chrome, Compa

Accessories
• Foreign Earrings: Neptune
• Foreign Crown: Noire
• Foreign Scarf: Blanc
• Foreign Necklace: Vert
• Foreign Belt: Chrome

*Note: The weapons are visible on the characters in battle, but the Bracelets and Accessories are not.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 32bit, 64bit (DirectX 12 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or AMD A9 2.9GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit (DirectX 12 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3GHz or AMD FX-8350 4.0GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card

short_description: The [Foreign Series] Equipment Set brings a wide array of weapons that'll help prepare Neptune and the gang for any 2D battle!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
